ErrorCode.name: UIDMustBeZero
ErrorCode.description: When creating a new project, the UID must be zero to allow the Database to return a unique ID

ErrorCode.name: ProjectDoesNotExist
ErrorCode.description: The requested project does not exist in the database

ErrorCode.name: ProjectBeingObserved
ErrorCode.description: The requested project is being observed at the time

ErrorCode.name: ProjectAlreadyObserved
ErrorCode.description: The requested project has already been observed
